page.title: 11CLUBS IN NASSINGTON.page a.
page.content: There are many different clubs for people to join.We did a survey and these are the clubs we found. {Nassington and District Royal British Legion}This group has regular Tuesday meetings and a few barbecues with stalls.{Nene Social Club}This club is for elderly people and has many outings and special events. {Nassington Mother And Toddlers Group} There are meetings every Thursday at the village hall with activities for small children.Once a month the health visitor has a well baby clinic. {Nassington Cricket Club}This successful club has two teams which play many matches.Some evenings there are social functions such as barbecues and discos.{Nassington And Yarwell Garden Society}Every year there is a garden show at the playing field for people from nearby villages and towns.
